channel.title: Runelive - All skills working, sounds, music, economy
channel.description:
[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img545/5711/runelive.png[/img]
[img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/images/forums.jpg[/img] [url=http://"http://runelive.lt/"]Official Website[/url] [img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/images/playnow.png[/img] [url=http://"http://runelive.lt/webclient"]Play Now[/url]
Server started today!
[center][b]What is Runelive?[/b] Runelive is private runescape server based on 2007 runescape.
[b]Main Features:[/b] NPC and PLAYER clipping Sounds system Music system

item.title: Runelive - All skills working, sounds, music, economy
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Ezys:

Yes i post to bump topic up and because i helped alot. So i want to have fun playing with some more players.

If It’s a ‘good’ Server, then there won’t be a need to bump this Thread. I’d love to hear how you helped a lot though. Please, feel free to enlighten me.

Read full topic

item.title: Runelive - All skills working, sounds, music, economy
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

This doesn’t look too bad. You should include what has been edited/implemented from the origin Base. I’d recommend this IF I knew for a fact that effort was put into it, and actual programming was done. [size=3pt]Almost nobody ever does this except for the Users who know what they’re doing. Please be different.[/size]

P.S. It’s painfully obvious when Users advertising their Server have their friends post in an attempt to promote it.

Read full topic
